Text:
This is just some screenshots and a link to a file sharing site where you fill out a survey so the uploader earns money.

You can download the actual file here: http://www.learnnavi.org/

This is fantastic!! I am looking forward to talk with the Na vi........It happen to be that I am crazy and live in a dream world, that's why I want to learn it. Next I am going to learn BullShit because I work on a farm.
Wow! It turns out my cat can speak Na'vi. I just didn't understand her before. Now, with this we can chat all night long. Yeeeepeee!!!
Wow... people are really going all out on this...
